docna.cdata!:
Mexico - Ports Project : Loan 0820 - Loan
            Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Mexico - Ports Project : Loan
            0820 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

docna.cdata!:
Mexico - Ports Project : Loan 0820 -
            Guarantee Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Mexico - Ports Project : Loan
            0820 - Guarantee Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the project are to
            provide high priority installations and equipment, mainly in
            the ports of Tampico, Veracruz, Guaymas, Mazatlan and
            Manzanillo and to improve country-wide port planning,
            administration and operation. The project consists of: (i) a
            grain-handling installation at Veracruz and consequent
            resiting of tanker berths; (ii) two self-propelled dredgers
            and other dredging equipment; (iii) warehouses at Veracruz,
            Tampico and Manzanillo and a transit shed at Veracruz; (iv)
            fire-fighting and port communications equipment; (v) mobile
            cargo-handling equipment; (vi) consultants' services
            for: (a) operations and accounting; (b) a national port
            development study including feasibility studies; and (c)
            dredging organization and equipment; and (vii) staff training.
